### Checklist

- [ ] Translation file(s) are in `translations/{style}/{NNNNN}.md`
- [ ] Frontmatter includes all required fields (commit_number, commit_sha, style, title, author, date)
- [ ] Followed the [style guide](../styles/) for the chosen style
- [ ] "The Translation" section uses the style's glossary consistently
- [ ] "The Changes" section accurately summarizes the technical changes
